imdb.title: Beruseruku
imdb.plot: Guts, "The Black Swordsman", is pursued by demons who are attracted to him, due to a demonic brand on his neck. His goal is to free himself, and his lover Casca, of this inescapable curse. His other life's goal is gain vengeance o...

episodes.title: Recollections of the Witch
episodes.plot: Schierke looks back at the history of the Black Swordsman.

episodes.title: The Rent World
episodes.plot: After encountering his old foe, Guts continues to look for Griffith.

episodes.title: Winter's Journey
episodes.plot: Serpico recalls his history with Lady Farnese. Guts gets a visit from a mysterious, but dark presence.

episodes.title: Banner of the Flying Sword
episodes.plot: Griffith expands his army. Mule Wolflame meets Sonia.

episodes.title: Forest of Demonic Beasts
episodes.plot: Guts and crew are confronted by a mysterious person in the woods. Can they trust her?

episodes.title: Spirit Realm
episodes.plot: After reaching the witch's house in the forest, Guts and crew know where they have to go next after speaking with the witch.

episodes.title: Fight for Survival Against the Demonic Legion
episodes.plot: Shortly after reaching the village, demonic creatures are on their way. It's up to Guts, Serpico, Isidro and Schierke to hold their ground.

episodes.title: The Arcana of Invocation
episodes.plot: After Schierke managed to create a strong magical barrier, two strong creatures show up. Can Guts and Serpico defeat them?

episodes.title: The Corruption of Qliphoth
episodes.plot: Guts and crew venture into the Qliphoth to rescue the trapped villagers. Once inside, they're met with a parade of nightmares, and must fight for their lives against hideous creatures.

episodes.title: The Berserker Armor
episodes.plot: While Guts is suffering from his heavy injuries, the only hope to defeat his strong opponent is to equip the mysterious armor hidden in the Witch's house.

episodes.title: A Journey Begins in Flames
episodes.plot: Guts puts on the Berserker armor and proceeds to fight Grunbeld.

episodes.title: Proclaimed Omens
episodes.plot: After a heavy battle, Guts and his crew reside on the beach, learning more about the consequences of the new armor.

episodes.title: City of Humans
episodes.plot: After arriving in a big city, Guts, Isidro and Schierke all go their own way for the rest of the day.

episodes.title: The Branded Swordsman
episodes.plot: In a time when outlaws and mercenaries serve as justice, and law and order is but a dream in a kingdom that hasn't seen peace in half of a lifetime, a shadowy figure enters a keep whose inhabitants have given themselves to the life of violence and debauchery that encompasses the desperate and evil alike. Wielding a massive iron sword, the figure persuades the miscreants to abide his dilemma, and leaves with a skin of water and bottle of spirits, freeing a sprightly fairy as passively as he would seemingly free his bladder. Rumors that he is known as the Black ...

episodes.title: The Holy Iron Chain Knights
episodes.plot: Guts is still coming to terms with his fateful encounter with the monk and his daughter when he is confronted by the Holy Iron Chain Knights. Their commander berates him about his many sins is declares he is to be brought to the Holy See.

episodes.title: Night of Miracles
episodes.plot: Guts and Puck are taken aback by Farnese's inability to see the elf. However, Farnese's refusal to accept anything beyond what she considers to be real in her world is about to be sorely tested.

episodes.title: Epiphany
episodes.plot: Guts is awoken by a nightmare of his former lover, Casca being burned at the stake. He sees his demonic and malformed son warn him of a holy land. So, Guts goes back to the house of a blacksmith friend, Godo, who took in Guts and Casca after their betrayal at the Eclipse Ceremony. At the house, Guts finds that Casca wandered away from the house and disappeared during an excursion out of her cave sanctuary. Guts demands that she be found, but is admonished by Godo and his daughter, Erica. Both of which say that he left them to pursue self-destructive vengeance, thus ...

episodes.title: Tower of Conviction
episodes.plot: While searching for Casca, Guts learns that an admirer has followed him. Meanwhile, the refugees from midland continue to suffer while Luca tries to conceal Casca's whereabouts.

episodes.title: Night Banquet of Burning at the Stake
episodes.plot: Casca gets saved by the giant fetus and Guts encounters the Skull Knight who says the God Hand is using St. Albion as a ritual to restore Griffith.

episodes.title: The Black Witch
episodes.plot: Guts is finally close to finding Casca, but Casca has caught the heretics' eye, and the Holy Iron Chain Knights are also homing in on the heretics' location...

episodes.title: Reunion in the Den
episodes.plot: Guts battles two powerful opponents. Isidro and Casca make an escape.

episodes.title: Blood Flow of the Dead
episodes.plot: Casca unveils her hidden powers, which attracts the attention of Mozgus. Guts is nearing Casca, and Luca meets a new entity.

episodes.title: Hell's Angels
episodes.plot: Luca learned all about the strange, egg-shaped demon, while Guts fought against Mozgus' followers.

episodes.title: Shadows of Ideas
episodes.plot: Guts is approaching Mozgus, while the strange blob is approaching the castle.

episodes.title: Those Who Cling, Those Who Struggle
episodes.plot: While the daylight is nearby, Guts and the crew have to defend themselves from the strange blob creatures. Nina runs into Luca.
